TopicTitle: Undocked, but still connected as two seperate entities

Articles.Content:
Lately, any time I want to undock anything, whether it's ships I've docked in orbit, or a payload attached to a cargo bay via docking port, the ships will not disconnect. They're undocked, but still stuck together at the ports. Switching to the Space Center and back will sometimes find them separated as if the undock was successful, and other times, both ships will kraken out on me.

Rather than go the usual route of posting logs and tediously trying to find a clue, I'd like to take a more broad approach. Has anyone else experienced this, and if so, was it related to a specific mod and fixed by removing it? I run a ton of mods. Probably too many. This, though, feels like it's less to do with the usual memory issues from running so many mods and more to do with some sort of conflict. Given the amount of mods I have, doing the one-by-one remove and check procedure would take the better part of my evening. That's why I'm asking you guys first. If that doesn't help, then I'll post the logs and go from there.

Thanks!
The last version of Kerbal Joint Reinforcement was plagued with docking related problems that were fixed in the newest release.
Just saw it was updated in CKAN. Gonna give it a whirl and see. Thanks!
